WorkItem.ClosedComment: Random suffix gear should be fixed in 5.4.2.  Please open a new issue if you find a new character that won't load after downloading 5.4.2.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi. My character will not load. I am able to load alts and also other peoples battle.net toons but not mine.
Here is the error:
System.IndexOutOfRangeException: Index was outside the bounds of the array.
   at Rawr.RandomSuffix.GetStatValue(Item item, Int32 id, AdditiveStat stat) in C:\Rawr-5.0\Rawr.Base\RandomSuffix.cs:line 681

   at Rawr.Reforging.ApplyReforging(Item baseItem, Int32 randomSuffixId) in C:\Rawr-5.0\Rawr.Base\Reforging.cs:line 186
   at Rawr.ItemInstance.OnIdsChanged() in C:\Rawr-5.0\Rawr.Base\Items\Item.cs:line 1399
   at Rawr.ItemInstance.set_ReforgeId(Int32 value) in C:\Rawr-5.0\Rawr.Base\Items\Item.cs:line 1359
   at Rawr.ItemInstance..ctor(String gemmedId) in C:\Rawr-5.0\Rawr.Base\Items\Item.cs:line 1688
   at Rawr.Character.SetGemmedId(CharacterSlot slot, String gemmedId) in C:\Rawr-5.0\Rawr.Base\Character.cs:line 689
   at Rawr.Character.set__wrist(String value) in C:\Rawr-5.0\Rawr.Base\Character.cs:line 706
   at Rawr.Server.Controllers.CharacterController.ConvertBattleNetJsonToCharacter(String json, String region) in C:\Rawr-5.0\Child Projects\Rawr.Server\Rawr.Server\Controllers\CharacterController.cs:line 400

Comments.Message: First things first, tell us specifically what character won't load.  Name and realm.

Duh, sorry about that:
Server: Firetree (US)
Name: Ammonia

Alright, good news and bad news.  Bad news is, Rawr is choking on your bracers, which are some type of random "of the something" gear that it doesn't recognize.  Good news is, that's the whole problem - equip different bracers and you can load your character again.  In the meantime, I'll figure out what to do about the random enchantment gear as soon as I can.  Thank you!

Sorry for the delay... That was indeed the issue and it is resolved now.
Thanks very much.

John
I have same issue. Knojac -Moon Gaurd
Knojac, yours loads fine here.  Did you try the new 5.4.1 build?
